4:
Double-click at the below mouse variable to see all mouse samples
<atext type="mouse" script="Click

-Double-click
Click x2

-Click at position (100, 100)
Click 100 100

-Right-click at position (100, 100)
Click 100 100 right

-Middle-click
Click middle

-Ctrl+Shift+Alt+Windows + Right-click at position (100, 100)
Click 100 100 right ctrl shift alt windows

-Move the cursor to position (100, 100)
Move 100 100

-Move the cursor 100 pixels horizontally and -100 pixels vertically
Move +100 -100

-Click and drag the cursor to position (100, 100)
Drag 100 100

-Click and drag the cursor 100 pixels horizontally and -100 pixels vertically
Drag +100 -100

-Rotate the wheel forward
Wheel 100

-Tilt the wheel to the right
Wheel 100 horizon

-Delay 100 miliseconds
Delay 100">🖰</atext>

Usages:

Click [x y]  [x#]  [mouse button]  [modifier keys]
    [x y]     → coordinates, or amount of motion of mouse. 100 100 means coordinates, +100 +100 means amount of motion
    [x2]     → double-click
    [mouse button]    → right, middle
    [modifier keys]    → all modifier keys from Windows and macOS: ctrl shift alt windows control option command cmd

Move x y

Drag x y [mouse button]

Wheel n [horizon] [modifier keys]
    [horizon]    → tilt the wheel to the left or right

Delay n
    → Delay n miliseconds
